blog.name: bringbackmar-vell
blog.title: Bring back Captain Mar-Vell
blog.description: We miss Mar-Vell, greatest protector of the universe, bring him back, he deserves a second chance.

question: Can you please,describe Mar-vell personality?
answer:
Tricky question… I’ll try to say something. He was someone with a strong morality, who cared more about people (kree, humans or other aliens, maybe not the skrulls) than to get promoted by the kree or serve his empire blindly, not a very good spy for the kree, someone who tried to balance his warrior side with the protector one. He was pretty smart and down to earth (he was able to control his cosmic awareness) and a good person. He had a great will power, think of  Khn'nr, a skrull who was affected by his will power and which made him protect Earth against his empire as Mar-Vell did.

Even though he couldn’t meet his children, he was kind of a father figure to Rick Jones, maybe more than Steve Rogers and more or less at the same level of Bruce Banner or a bit more (their bond).


Please, @captainmarvelthekree, @lorkhran @panels-of-interest describe him as well.

summary: EBay Launches Black Panther Destination After Seeing Comic Sales Soar 30%
title: EBay Launches Black Panther Destination After Seeing Comic Sales Soar 30%
body:
EBay Launches Black Panther Destination After Seeing Comic Sales Soar 30%

After the success of Black Panther and other comic book film properties that has spurred eBay’s comic sales to increase by 30%, eBay has launched a Black Panther destination.

This new Black Panther destinationwill feature “a curated collection of memorabilia from the Oscar-nominated film including high-value and accessible comics,” eBay’s Vice President of Merchandising at eBay North America Sam…

View On WordPress

blog.name: bringbackmar-vell
blog.title: Bring back Captain Mar-Vell
blog.description: We miss Mar-Vell, greatest protector of the universe, bring him back, he deserves a second chance.

summary: What is like the relationship between Mar-vell and Adam Warlock?
question: What is like the relationship between Mar-vell and Adam Warlock?
answer: Sorry for the late reply @vintagelucystark. Well, they only could meet in the storyline ‘Thanos: The final threat’ (Avengers annual #7 and Marvel Two-in-one annual #2). Where Captain Marvel, Adam Warlock and The Avengers (and the Thing and Spider-man) fight Thanos for the last time (in the 1970′s). Theyhad a couple of moments alone and Mar-Vell sees how he dies. They had many things in common (besides Starlin), cosmic characters in space, going against their creators/empire, great hair, Thanos, etc. I think that they would have understood each other and could have been good friends. Here some pages to see it:

blog.name: loveandsupportforcaptainmarvel
blog.title: Captain Marvel Doesn't Care For Your Sexism
blog.description: Blog dedicated to standing up to the hate directed at Captain Marvel

title: Captain Marvel tests
body:
Bechdel Test: Carol talks with Maria about flying, seems to have a genuine friendship with her

Sexy Lamp Test: Carol can’t be replaced with a sexy lamp and still have the plot remain intact

Mako Mori Test: Carol has a narrative arc about finding out about her forgotten past and discovering that the people she’s working for aren’t as good as they seem

Furiosa Test: Pissed off manbabies on the internet

Last Jedi Test: Pissed off White Boys are leaving negative comments on YouTube and trying to affect the rating on Rotten Tomatoes 

And now I suggest we add a new test- The Captain Marvel Test: Pissed off White Boys and manbabies are trying to boycott the movie

Sexy Lamp Test: Carol can’t be replaced with a sexy lamp and still have the plot remain intact

Mako Mori Test: Carol has a narrative arc about finding out about her forgotten past and discovering that the people she’s working for aren’t as good as they seem

Furiosa Test: Pissed off manbabies on the internet

Last Jedi Test: Pissed off White Boys are leaving negative comments on YouTube and trying to affect the rating on Rotten Tomatoes 

And now I suggest we add a new test- The Captain Marvel Test: Pissed off White Boys and manbabies are trying to boycott the movie

Bechdel Test: Carol talks with Maria about flying, seems to have a genuine friendship with her

Sexy Lamp Test: Carol can’t be replaced with a sexy lamp and still have the plot remain intact

Mako Mori Test: Carol has a narrative arc about finding out about her forgotten past and discovering that the people she’s working for aren’t as good as they seem

Furiosa Test: Pissed off manbabies on the internet

Last Jedi Test: Pissed off White Boys are leaving negative comments on YouTube and trying to affect the rating on Rotten Tomatoes 

And now I suggest we add a new test- The Captain Marvel Test: Pissed off White Boys and manbabies are trying to boycott the movie
trail.content:

Sexy Lamp Test: Carol can’t be replaced with a sexy lamp and still have the plot remain intact

Mako Mori Test: Carol has a narrative arc about finding out about her forgotten past and discovering that the people she’s working for aren’t as good as they seem

Furiosa Test: Pissed off manbabies on the internet

Last Jedi Test: Pissed off White Boys are leaving negative comments on YouTube and trying to affect the rating on Rotten Tomatoes 

And now I suggest we add a new test- The Captain Marvel Test: Pissed off White Boys and manbabies are trying to boycott the movie

tags: in norwigian pawn is called farmer
summary: Avengers 4 is called engame because just like chess it is so few pieces left, and one good chance to win would be to promote a...
body: Avengers 4 is called engame because just like chess it is so few pieces left, and one good chance to win would be to promote a pawn to a queen. That is how they get captain marvel. They have to send a pawn (happy? hawkeye?) to the other side of the game (hell?). captain marvel is dead and they have to exchange happy or curt.

tags: if you can see her you can be her
summary: This is what these weak boys are afraid of. They’re afraid of little girls like this seeing that they can be as powerful as...
caption: This is what these weak boys are afraid of. They’re afraid of little girls like this seeing that they can be as powerful as Captain Marvel. They can go higher, further, faster and make a change in the world. They can pierce the sky and break the glass ceiling. They won’t allow this toxic patriarchy to hold them down anymore. They’re going to show the world that women are as powerful as Captain Marvel. These men on the internet are powerless against them.

blog.description: Blog dedicated to standing up to the hate directed at Captain Marvel

tags: I draw my power from breaking their fragile egos
summary: Captain Marvel is currently at a 37% want to see rating on Rotten Tomatoes. These toxic men are doing to this just what they did...
body: Captain Marvel is currently at a 37% want to see rating on Rotten Tomatoes. These toxic men are doing to this just what they did with The Last Jedi. They have no reason to hate this movie besides the fact that it stars a woman. I know movie reviewers can be biased sometimes, but I can’t wait for their reviews to be published so that they can destroy those whiny White Boys. They think this is going to hurt the movie? Every time they do something like this we just grow stronger. Captain Marvel is getting so much publicity from this. And you know that the men saying they won’t see the movie are still gonna see it because it’s gonna be good.
